channel.title: Need Help With Running Client!
channel.description:
Yeh, I've been trying to make a server, after 2 years break, new computer and everything. I can't remember anything about this and so..
So, i guess my classpaths are messed up or something. But always when i try to run any client it says "Could not find the main class: Gui" or "Could not find the main class: Server" or w/e it is. I know what is wrong, it can't find it, cuz the paths are fucked.
Please help ;)

item.title: Need Help With Running Client!
item.dc:creator: @lollazer lollazer
item.description:
@lollazer wrote:

Yeh, I’ve been trying to make a server, after 2 years break, new computer and everything. I can’t remember anything about this and so…

So, i guess my classpaths are messed up or something. But always when i try to run any client it says “Could not find the main class: Gui” or “Could not find the main class: Server” or w/e it is. I know what is wrong, it can’t find it, cuz the paths are fucked.
